Name: Afterburner
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-heat a Snifter/Brandy balloon glass .
Tip glass to near horizontal, and CAREFULLY flambé.
Extinguish flame by covering flaming tankard with base of the other tankard.
Review: A surprisingly smooth and moreish peppermint-laced drink.
